combos.name: Leap
combos.desc: jump high in the air, dealing 5 damage when landing to all enemies in a 5 block radius

combos.name: Shoot
combos.desc: shoot an arrow that deals 2 damage

combos.name: Arrow Rain
combos.desc: 20 arrows fall where you're looking at

combos.name: Detonate
combos.desc: explode all arrows in a 20 block radius, dealing 1 damage each

combos.name: Shock
combos.desc: cast a lightning bolt in front of you dealing 4-7 damage

combos.name: Superconduct
combos.desc: lighting strikes all players in water in a 20 block radius

combos.name: Thunder
combos.desc: when you have 3 charges, mark a point for a lighting strike that lasts 5 seconds

combos.name: Radiance
combos.desc: toggles a continuous beam that deals 0.3 damage and can pierce infinitely. You loose 10 stamina per tick while the beam is active

combos.name: Blinding Light
combos.desc: the first enemy hit by Radiance will be blinded for 3 seconds

combos.name: Refraction
combos.desc: when in water, teleport where you're lookin within a 20 block radius

combos.name: Focus
combos.desc: the next time you use Radiance, the beam will be shorter but deal more damage

combos.name: Diffuse
combos.desc: the next time you use Radiance, the beam will be longer but deal less damage
